repair.repairedDockerfile:
# Build peerflix server
FROM node:14-alpine as build

RUN apk --no-cache add git && \
    npm install -g grunt bower && npm cache clean --force;

WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./

COPY app app
COPY server server
COPY bower.json .
COPY .bowerrc .
COPY Gruntfile.js .
COPY karma.conf.js .

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;
RUN bower --allow-root install
RUN grunt build
RUN npm prune --production

RUN mkdir release && \
    cp -r /app/node_modules release/node_modules && \
    cp -r /app/dist release/dist && \
    cp -r /app/server release/server && \
    cp -r package.json release/

# Create final image
FROM node:14-alpine
ENV PEERFLIX_CONFIG_PATH /app/config

RUN apk --no-cache add ffmpeg

WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=build /app/release ./

VOLUME /tmp/torrent-stream /app/config

USER node

EXPOSE 6881 9000

ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/local/bin/npm", "start"]
CMD ["--no-update-notifier"]
